ISSUE.TITLE: Changes in the default "click-to-zoom" behaviour in the product picture gallery
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The default "click-to-zoom" behaviour in the product picture gallery is a bit strange - there is this setting mediasettings.defaultpicturezoomenabled which allows or disallows the click-to-zoom functionality for the main product picture, but the thumbnails are unaffected, they always zoom on click. Usually most users will expect the thumbnail (when clicked) to switch the main image above, and only the main image to zoom (when clicked). Perhaps this can be optimized in NopCommerce too. Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/46315/minor-changes-request-for-nopcommerce-390.aspx
